landing.validInstructions: Your completion of this form is a valuable step towards connecting individuals with resources in the Greater Knoxville area. To learn more about our services, please visit our {{website}}.
landing.invalidInstructions: It seems the form link you have been provided is invalid. Please reach out to us via email at {{email}} or by phone at {{phone}} to receive a valid link for your organization. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

preliminaries.title: Preliminaries
preliminaries.description: Let's get to know your agency...
preliminaries.name: Legal Agency Name

services.title: Services
services.instructionsDesktop: Add or select a service to begin.
services.instructionsMobile: Open the services list to begin.
services.name: Name

contact.title: Contact Person
contact.description: Only add contact person if different from Director or if contact persons differ by service.

eligibility.title: Eligibility Process
eligibility.description: Who is eligible for this service? Who is the population the service is trying to serve? It is okay to restrict services to certain populations based on gender; family status, disability, age, personal situations, etc. (i.e. battered women with children, people with visual impairments, homeless men, etc.) This helps us to make appropriate referrals.

applicationProcess.title: Application Process
applicationProcess.description: How would someone apply for this service?

fees.title: Fees
fees.description: Are individuals charged for your services? What is your fee structure?

requiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
requiredDocuments.description: What would someone need to bring when applying?

eligibility.title: Who is eligible to volunteer?
eligibility.description: List type of volunteer work, age, training, background checks, and other requirements for your volunteers.

acceptDonations.title: Does your organization accept ongoing, non-monetary donations in support of programs or services?

list.title: Please list.
list.description: Example: pet food, clothing, appliances, furniture

other.title: Are there other agencies or services that have been helpful that you would recommend to be included in our resource database?
other.contactInformation: Please provide contact information for these agencies/services.

review.title: Review
review.description: Please review your selections and submit.

signin.title: Sign In
signin.disclaimer: By signing in, you agree to our {{link}} and {{link}}.
signin.missionStatement: United Way of Greater Knoxville is driving change in our community by uniting people, businesses, and organizations. Together, we're creating a more equitable Knoxville where we have stable housing, financial security, quality early care and education, access to food, and more. Join us and answer the call.

errors.phone: Must be a valid phone number.
